A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a massive disappointment this movie is. It repeats so many of the errors of the prequel trilogy\, but makes things much worse by ruining the legacy of beloved characters from the original movies. It does not feel like Star Wars. It has too many characters\, it is too disjounted and long. There is too much humor and interest poorly placed. It introduces and discards too many heroes. This is not what Star Wars is and Disney must course correct.
